source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007000_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>But no matter how much hope exists, ever will there be more despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007000_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>Hinter jedem Hoffnungs<var 16 /var>schimmer lauert ein Schatten der Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007010_METEION<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007010_METEION<tab>(-Meteions Gedankenecho-)Die Reue von heute ist die Trauer von morgen. Tag für Tag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007020_EAA<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007020_EAA<tab>Die Reue von heute ist die Trauer von morgen, Tag für Tag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007030_EAB<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007030_EAB<tab>Die Reue von heute ist die Trauer von morgen. Tag für Tag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007040_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007040_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>Die Reue von heute ist die Trauer von morgen, Tag für Tag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007050_METEION<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007050_METEION<tab>(-Meteions Gedankenecho-)Solange du lebst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007060_EAA<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007060_EAA<tab>Solange du lebst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007070_EAB<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007070_EAB<tab>Solange du lebst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007080_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007080_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>Solange du lebst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Seven hells!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bei den Göttern!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>On your guard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>Aufgepasst!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007110_ENDSINGER<tab>Ahhh, the rage... It rises... Rises...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007110_ENDSINGER<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>... Schmerz<var 1D /var>... Zorn<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007120_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007120_ESTINIEN<tab>Hua!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007130_METEION<tab>Stop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007130_METEION<tab>(-???-)Hör auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007140_METEION<tab>Calm yourself. Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007140_METEION<tab>Beruhige dich doch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007150_THANCRED<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007150_THANCRED<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007170_ENDSINGER<tab>We die in pain. We die in suffering! Who are you to live? Who are you to hope!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007170_ENDSINGER<tab>Harrr, wie könnt ihr so unbekümmert leben? Während wir qualvoll enden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007180_URIANGER<tab>Hold on, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007180_URIANGER<tab>Jetzt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger, watch out!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Über dir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007200_URIANGER<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007200_URIANGER<tab>Ah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007210_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Uaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007220_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007220_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007230_ENDSINGER<tab>We cannot comprehend. We cannot know. We cannot know!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007230_ENDSINGER<tab>Wie können wir, vom Schicksal so geschunden, noch Hoffnung haben<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007240_METEION<tab>Don't, please! Don't do this to them. To yourself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007240_METEION<tab>Tu ihnen nichts! Du machst alles nur noch schlimmer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007250_ALISAIE<tab>Just one good strike.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007250_ALISAIE<tab>Ich brauch nur eine Chance!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007260_ALISAIE<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007260_ALISAIE<tab>He?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007270_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007270_ALISAIE<tab>Aaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007280_METEION<tab>Stop. Please, stop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007280_METEION<tab>Hör auf! Bitte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007290_ENDSINGER<tab>We will not suffer alone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007290_ENDSINGER<tab>Warum sollen nur wir Schmerz erleiden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007300_ENDSINGER<tab>All will know our pain!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007300_ENDSINGER<tab>Sie alle sollen ihn spüren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007310_GRAHATIA<tab>No you don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007310_GRAHATIA<tab>Nein! Niemals!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007320_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007320_GRAHATIA<tab>Uh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007330_ENDSINGER<tab>All awash in ice. A frozen waste. Forever silent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007330_ENDSINGER<tab>Alles wird erlöschen, erkalten, erstarren<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007340_ALISAIE<tab>Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007340_ALISAIE<tab>Warte!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007350_ALISAIE<tab>Don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007350_ALISAIE<tab>Nein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007360_ENDSINGER<tab>You gifted them escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007360_ENDSINGER<tab>Du hast deine Freunde gerettet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007370_ENDSINGER<tab>And rendered yourself powerless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007370_ENDSINGER<tab>Und nun bist du ganz allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007380_ENDSINGER<tab>Bereft of the synergy you claim is your strength. Unless you mean to call upon the dead once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007380_ENDSINGER<tab>Wenn eure Stärke darin liegt, dass ihr euch die Hand reicht<var 1D /var>... bist du jetzt machtlos. Oder glaubst du etwa, die zwei Schatten werden dir helfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007390_ENDSINGER<tab>Defiant to the last. But you will be one with us ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007390_ENDSINGER<tab>Ha. Ein letztes Zeichen des Widerstands. Doch schon bald wirst du untergehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007400_ENDSINGER<tab>You will be battered and torn and made to crawl. You will weep and wail and curse your impotence. Curse your life as it fades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007400_ENDSINGER<tab>Geschlagen, geschunden, auf dem Boden windend, wirst du deine Machtlosigkeit in die Welt hinausschreien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007410_ENDSINGER<tab>As we did! As we died!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007410_ENDSINGER<tab>So, wie wir geschrien haben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007420_ENDSINGER<tab>Such pain and sorrow we felt... Such anguish and rage... We tried. We tried. But it was no use...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007420_ENDSINGER<tab>Die Trauer, der Schmerz, das Leid<var 1D /var>... Wir haben alles gelebt, doch was hat es uns gebracht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007430_ENDSINGER<tab>Only when we surrendered did we find release. Only when we embraced death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007430_ENDSINGER<tab>Wir sind zusammen gestorben, mehr nicht. Am Ende teilten wir uns nichts außer den Tod.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007440_ENDSINGER<tab>So join us in despair...and embrace yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007440_ENDSINGER<tab>Du gehst jetzt unter, in bodenloser Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007450_ENDSINGER<tab>My Ultimatum... What is happening...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007450_ENDSINGER<tab>Was<var 1D /var>... Was ist? Was passiert mit meinem Nest?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007460_ZENOS<tab>At the end of everything I find you, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007460_ZENOS<tab>Hab ich dich endlich gefunden, <var 08 E905 ((meine treue Gefährtin)) ((mein treuer Freund)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007470_ZENOS<tab>I sought something in you, once. As you did in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007470_ZENOS<tab>Ich weiß jetzt, was du in mir suchtest. Und auch, was meine Seele von dir verlangte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007480_ZENOS<tab>When at last I understood what it was, I journeyed to Sharlayan to seek you out. Struck a bargain with the woman who shares your gift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007480_ZENOS<tab>Hoch oben in den nördlichen Meeren schloss ich einen Handel mit der Frau von eurem Bund. Diejenige, die deine Gabe hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007510_ZENOS<tab>In exchange for lending the Scions my aid, I was given the means to come hither.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007510_ZENOS<tab>Nur einmal sollte ich dem Bund in der Not helfen. Ich schlug ein, und es öffnete mir einen Weg an den Rand des Universums - zu dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007520_ZENOS<tab>Gorging upon what remained of the Mothercrystal, I reclaimed the form of the dragon. And hungry still for our reunion, I rode the light of the stars to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007520_ZENOS<tab>Ich verleibte mir den Rest des Urkristalls ein, nahm diese Form an und schwang mich empor in den Raum zwischen den Sternen. Der Gedanke an einen Kampf mit dir beflügelte mich so, dass ich gar das Licht überholte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007530_ZENOS<tab>I take it this is your prey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007530_ZENOS<tab>Das ist also die Beute, auf die du es abgesehen hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007550_ZENOS<tab>But why does it still live? Surely it is no match for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007550_ZENOS<tab>Warum ist sie noch am Leben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007560_ZENOS<tab>I had assumed you would be above something so banal as despair. Am I mistaken?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007560_ZENOS<tab>Hast du mir nicht deutlich zu verstehen gegeben, dass du niemals der Boshaftigkeit verfällst, nie die Hoffnung verlierst? Stimmte das etwa nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I don't want your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Glaubst du wirklich, dass ich deine Hilfe brauche?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>If it comes to it, I won't save you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Glaub nicht, dass ich dich beschützen werde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007570_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007570_ZENOS<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007580_ZENOS<tab>And I'd rather not give it. Nay, I would have preferred that we enjoy a private reunion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007580_ZENOS<tab>Aber ja. Das würde mir gefallen.<var 1D /var>... Vielleicht würde es mich auch langweilen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007590_ZENOS<tab>I care not. What I desire of you isn't succor. It is satisfaction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007590_ZENOS<tab>Natürlich. Wenn du deine Waffe führst, dann gegen mich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007600_ZENOS<tab>So come, let us dispense with this distraction, you and I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007600_ZENOS<tab>Endlich! Die letzte Jagd beginnt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007610_ENDSINGER<tab>You struggle in vain. You will not silence our song of oblivion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007610_ENDSINGER<tab>Höre unseren Gesang vom Ende, und lerne, zu verzweifeln!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007620_ENDSINGER<tab>You will never reach it. Will never reach the deliverance you seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007620_ENDSINGER<tab>Oh nein, dies wird nicht so enden, wie ihr es wollt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007630_ENDSINGER<tab>If this...was not the answer...then what is it? Where lies...happiness...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007630_ENDSINGER<tab>Habe ich mich etwa geirrt? Gibt es doch<var 1D /var>... irgendwo<var 1D /var>... noch Hoffnung?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007640_METEION<tab>No matter where we flew, there was only darkness and loneliness and pain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007640_METEION<tab>Überall ist es nur dunkel<var 1D /var>... einsam<var 1D /var>... Egal wie weit ich fliege.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007650_METEION<tab>We couldn't find the answers Hermes yearned for. The answers he deserved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007650_METEION<tab>Ich wollte Hermes die Antwort überbringen, die er sich so ersehnte<var 1D /var>... Doch ich fand sie nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007660_METEION<tab>Greetings... You who are my final encounter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007660_METEION<tab>Ich komme in Frieden<var 1D /var>... So habe ich auch dich begrüßt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007670_METEION<tab>I wish to hear your words... Share your feelings... Know your thoughts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007670_METEION<tab>Ich wollte deine Stimme hören<var 1D /var>... deine Seele fühlen<var 1D /var>... deine Gedanken kennen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007680_METEION<tab>May we please...be friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007680_METEION<tab>Freunde werden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007690_METEION<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007690_METEION<tab>(Schnief)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007700_METEION<tab>Yes, I can see them... The memories of a long, long journey...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007700_METEION<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Jetzt höre ich es<var 1D /var>... dein Herz<var 1D /var>... die Erinnerungen an deine Reisen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007710_METEION<tab>So many people... The thoughts of them overflowing in your heart...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007710_METEION<tab>So viele Freunde<var 1D /var>... so viele Geschichten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007720_METEION<tab>What they live for, what gives their lives meaning... There was never a single answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007720_METEION<tab>Es gibt nicht nur eine Antwort<var 1D /var>... auf den Sinn des Lebens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007730_METEION<tab>You gather pieces of happiness, precious and fragile, only to lose them. Then start again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007730_METEION<tab>Man gewinnt das eine, verliert das andere<var 1D /var>... Man lebt und entdeckt immer wieder Neues<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007740_METEION<tab>On and on it goes, until death takes you into its gentle embrace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007740_METEION<tab>Bis man stirbt<var 1D /var>... neben <var 08 E905 ((einer)) ((einem)) /var>, so zärtlich wie du.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007750_METEION<tab>That which Hermes sent us to find...was there all this time. On Etheirys.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007750_METEION<tab>Ich flog und flog, aber was Hermes suchte, das lag von Anfang an auf deinem Planeten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It wasn't always there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Es war nicht immer da. Wir mussten unsere Welt erst schaffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We created it together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Unser Planet ist eine Welt, die wir gemeinsam schufen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007760_METEION<tab>Like a field of flowers, perhaps. At first a single blossom, it spreads and takes on more colors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007760_METEION<tab>Die Welt ist wie ein Blumenbeet. Man fügt hier und da eine Farbe hinzu, und sieht zu, wie es wächst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007770_METEION<tab>Thank you for guiding me here. To find these words at journey's end fills me with joy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007770_METEION<tab>Danke. Dafür, dass du meiner Reise ein wundervolles Ende gegeben hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007780_METEION<tab>And so, before I fall forever silent, there is one thing I must do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007780_METEION<tab>Eins noch, bevor ich gehe<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007790_METEION<tab>No expression of regret will undo what my sisters and I have done. Will restore what we have stolen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007790_METEION<tab>Was wir nahmen, kehrt nie wieder zurück. Dafür gibt es keine Vergebung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007800_METEION<tab>But if you would allow it, I would sing one last song. A song of the newfound joy that swells in my heart...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007800_METEION<tab>Zuallerletzt möchte ich noch ein Lied singen. Ein Lied von der Freude, die endlich in mein Herz einzog.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007810_METEION<tab>Of the beauty of light when it shines across a dark and starless sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007810_METEION<tab>Ein Lied über das Licht, das durch sternenlose Meere scheint. Ein Glanz, so wunderschön.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007820_METEION<tab>Of a dream that from the soil of worlds now lost to sorrow, life will spring forth once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007820_METEION<tab>Die Sterne, ihrer Bewohner beraubt<var 1D /var>... die Kontinente, von Trauer verwüstet<var 1D /var>... Auf ihnen soll eines Tages wieder das Leben einkehren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007830_METEION<tab>...Nourished by gentle rains and caressed by uplifting winds. A song of hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007830_METEION<tab>Ein Lied, welches die Saat dem Winde gleich hinausträgt und sie wie der Regen nährt<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007840_METEION<tab>One day, life will fill the universe again. And Hermes will see this and smile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007840_METEION<tab>Hermes soll das Leben sehen, wie es in voller Blüte steht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007850_METEION<tab>How, I do not know. But I do know that, where there is a will, there is a way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007850_METEION<tab>Ich weiß, dass es nicht leicht ist. Aber das Dynamis wird meine Wünsche erfüllen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007860_METEION<tab>After all, miracles happen every day, do they not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007860_METEION<tab>Und manchmal geschehen auch Wunder. Oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007870_METEION<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007870_METEION<tab>Ahaha! Hehe-he!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007880_METEION<tab>I will create a path back to your ship, where your dear friends await.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007880_METEION<tab>Und nun<var 1D /var>... Öffne ich dir den Weg zu deinen Freunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007890_METEION<tab>Hold in your heart your desire to return to them, then follow my lead and walk forth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007890_METEION<tab>Wenn ich weg bin, musst du nur einen Schritt nach vorne tun und dir von ganzem Herzen wünschen, zu ihnen zurückzukehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007900_METEION<tab>That hope will surely guide you true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007900_METEION<tab>Dein Wunsch wird dich sicher zu ihnen leiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007910_ZENOS<tab>You mean to return. To the world where you are hailed as a hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007910_ZENOS<tab>Was denn? Willst du nicht zurück und für alle wieder <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin)) ((den Helden)) /var> spielen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007920_ZENOS<tab>Hear me then. Not as a hero, but as simply...you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007920_ZENOS<tab>Dann sage ich es dir hier. Hör gut zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007930_ZENOS<tab>As I learned in Ala Mhigo, you are a formidable foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007930_ZENOS<tab>Ich weiß nun, was mich bei unserem Kampf in Ala Mhigo so erregt hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007940_ZENOS<tab>Stronger than any I have faced. Against you, I need bring my all to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007940_ZENOS<tab>Nie hat ein Gegner so verbissen gekämpft wie du. Wir fochten einen Kampf um den letzten Atemzug, den letzten Blutstropfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007950_ZENOS<tab>I need burn through the candle of my life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007950_ZENOS<tab>Das heißt es, zu leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007960_ZENOS<tab>This is the sole pleasure I know, and it is the sole pleasure I have to share.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007960_ZENOS<tab>Das ist mein Lebenszweck. Und gleichzeitig das größte Geschenk, das ich dir machen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007970_ZENOS<tab>And so I come before you. To issue challenge and offer singular bliss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007970_ZENOS<tab>Und nun bitte ich dich um eine Revanche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007980_ZENOS<tab>If you wish to walk away, I will not stop you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007980_ZENOS<tab>Wenn du ablehnst, lasse ich dich zu deinen Freunden zurückkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007990_ZENOS<tab>You value life. You do not burn yours save for reasons you deem worthy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007990_ZENOS<tab>Der Schuster, die Magd, sie hängen an ihren Leben. Deswegen scheuen sie die Gefahr und vermeiden jedes Risiko.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008000_ZENOS<tab>Reasons such as those which brought you here. The salvation of a world and its people. The motives of a hero true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008000_ZENOS<tab>Helden wollen das Leben der Schwachen beschützen, also blicken sie dem Tod ins Auge und gehen bis ans Ende der Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008010_ZENOS<tab>But there is more to you than that. You know this to be true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008010_ZENOS<tab>Aber hier ist nichts, was dich zum Helden macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008020_ZENOS<tab>As surely as you know the thrill of pushing your body and soul to their limits. Of confronting ever-mightier foes, dancing ever closer to the precipice, wondering if this will be the one to finally, finally...fill the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008020_ZENOS<tab>Erinnere dich an die Dächer von Ala Mihgo! Das Blut! Das Klirren der Waffen! Den Rausch, den man nur verspürt, wenn es um Leben oder Tod geht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008030_ZENOS<tab>Such pleasures, you seek for their own sake, and no other reason. Is this not so...<var 1A 02 /var>adventurer<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008030_ZENOS<tab>Du hast die gleiche Ekstase gespürt. <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>That, I can't deny.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ja. Ich habe es gespürt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Think what you will. But I'm not letting you leave this place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass du diesen Ort verlässt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've had enough of you. It ends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Hör auf, du widerst mich an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008040_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008040_ZENOS<tab>He.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008050_ZENOS<tab>Acceptance. At long last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008050_ZENOS<tab>Dann lass es uns noch einmal tun.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008060_ZENOS<tab>The conflagration of our clash will scorch even the stars!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008060_ZENOS<tab>Mein Leben oder deins<var 1D /var>... Der Himmel, die Sterne, wir kämpfen um alles!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008070_ZENOS<tab>So you would still play the hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008070_ZENOS<tab>Immer noch voll edler Heldenmut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008080_ZENOS<tab>No matter. In acceptance you betray your deception. You know full well what we are, and what we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008080_ZENOS<tab>Aber gut. Im Kampf um Leben und Tod werde ich es dir zeigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008090_ZENOS<tab>To shine incandescent in death's shadow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008090_ZENOS<tab>Was es heißt, wirklich zu leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008095_ZENOS<tab>Finally mustered the desire to kill me, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008095_ZENOS<tab>Ha. Endlich regt sich die Mordlust in dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008096_ZENOS<tab>Go on, then. Try and strike me down in this forsaken place. I shall return the favor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008096_ZENOS<tab>Gut. Schlag mir den Kopf ein! Weide mich aus! Ich werde mich ebenfalls nicht zurückhalten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008097_ZENOS<tab>Aye, let us indulge in the only worthwhile pursuit, and burn our lives to their ends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008097_ZENOS<tab>Zusammen geben wir uns einer letzten Ekstase hin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008100_ZENOS<tab>Come, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008100_ZENOS<tab>Komm schon!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008110_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008110_ZENOS<tab>Uh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008120_ZENOS<tab>That I should lose again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008120_ZENOS<tab>Arrr ... Ich habe verloren. Schon wieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008130_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008130_ZENOS<tab>Hehe<var 1D /var>.... hehehehe<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008140_ZENOS<tab>How disappointing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008140_ZENOS<tab>Wie überaus ärgerlich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008150_ZENOS<tab>Never have I understood those around me. Understood their obsessions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008150_ZENOS<tab>Ich habe nie verstanden, warum die Leute um mich herum nichtigen Dingen solchen Wert zumaßen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008160_ZENOS<tab>Besieged by their banality, the world was a mire of tedium and trivialities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008160_ZENOS<tab>Diese Welt gleicht<var 1D /var>... einem faulen Sumpf, trostlos und langweilig<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008170_ZENOS<tab>But in these fleeting moments, there is...a spark. Blinding, brilliant...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008170_ZENOS<tab>Nur ab und an konnte ich ihm entkommen und für den Funken eines Augenblicks wahre Lust verspüren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008180_ZENOS<tab>Gone...too soon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008180_ZENOS<tab>Ein schnelles, flüchtiges Vergnügen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008190_ZENOS<tab>What of you, my mirror? Born into this world, bestowed name, bid to seek out strife and adventure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008190_ZENOS<tab>Und du? Wurdest in diese Welt geboren, um ein unglaubliches Abenteuer nach dem anderen zu erleben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008200_ZENOS<tab>Was this life a gift...or a burden?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008200_ZENOS<tab>Dein Leben<var 1D /var>... war ein Wunder<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008210_ZENOS<tab>Did you find...fulfillment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008210_ZENOS<tab>So viel besser<var 1D /var>... als meins<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008220_ZENOS<tab>I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008220_ZENOS<tab>Ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008230_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008230_ZENOS<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008240_ESTINIEN<tab>Can you hear... Say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008240_ESTINIEN<tab>He<var 1D /var>... du mich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008250_URIANGER<tab>...must tend to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008250_URIANGER<tab>Schnell, helft<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008260_GRAHATIA<tab>Open your... ...please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008260_GRAHATIA<tab>Mach<var 1D /var>... auf, bitte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008270_YSHTOLA<tab>Someone...hand...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008270_YSHTOLA<tab>Helft mir mal<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Komm<var 1D /var>... dir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008290_ALISAIE<tab>[SOBBING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008290_ALISAIE<tab>Uh, uhuu ,uh

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008300_ALISAIE<tab>You can't leave us... Not like this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008300_ALISAIE<tab>(-???-)Bitte mach die Augen auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008310_ALISAIE<tab>If you do, I'll never forgive you... So, come on! Open your eyes and get up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008310_ALISAIE<tab>(-???-)Wie kannst du uns so im Stich lassen! Wach auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008320_ALISAIE<tab>[GASP] Report if displayed
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008320_ALISAIE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you...are you with us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du bist wieder wach!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank the heavens... For a moment we thought...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ach<var 1D /var>... Ein Segen<var 1D /var>... Den Göttern sei Dank!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is everyone all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ist jemand verletzt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Am I really alive?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich<var 1D /var>... Ich lebe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008350_GRAHATIA<tab>After what you've done, you're the last person...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008350_GRAHATIA<tab>Verletzt? Was redest du denn da!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008360_GRAHATIA<tab>...To be asking that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008360_GRAHATIA<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... keiner verletzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008370_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008370_GRAHATIA<tab>(schluchz)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008380_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, you're alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008380_GRAHATIA<tab>Ja, natürlich lebst du!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008390_GRAHATIA<tab>You're alive...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008390_GRAHATIA<tab>Du lebst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008400_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008400_GRAHATIA<tab>(schluchz)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008410_GRAHATIA<tab>You... How can you keep your promise if you're not here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008410_GRAHATIA<tab>Ohne dich kann ich doch mein Versprechen nicht halten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008420_ESTINIEN<tab>Another fine show you've put on, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008420_ESTINIEN<tab>Da hast du wirklich ganz große Arbeit geleistet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008430_YSHTOLA<tab>A fine show indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008430_YSHTOLA<tab>Diesmal ist es gut ausgegangen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008440_YSHTOLA<tab>What were you thinking, fighting alone? Never do that again. My poor heart couldn't bear it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008440_YSHTOLA<tab>... aber bitte zieh nie wieder alleine los. Weißt du eigentlich, was wir uns für Sorgen gemacht haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008450_THANCRED<tab>Put yourself in our place. If you hadn't returned, how do you think we would feel? And if that sounds harsh...it's because we care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008450_THANCRED<tab>Genau! Was glaubst du, wie sich das anfühlt, einfach so wegteleportiert zu werden. Also wirklich, wenn wir nicht so gut befreundet wären<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008460_URIANGER<tab>We tended to thy wounds as best we could, but how is the pain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008460_URIANGER<tab>Damit solltest du fürs Erste versorgt sein. Hast du noch Schmerzen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008470_URIANGER<tab>That is gladdening. Grievous as thine injuries were, however, I would counsel repose for a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008470_URIANGER<tab>Deine Wunden waren tief, aber etwas Ruhe wird dich wieder auf die Beine bringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008480_ALISAIE<tab>Gladdening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008480_ALISAIE<tab>Nichts ist gut!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008490_ALISAIE<tab>There's nothing gladdening about this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008490_ALISAIE<tab>Wie kannst du nur so unvorsichtig sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008500_ALISAIE<tab>When Meteion appeared in here and told us that you were right behind her, we all got our hopes up. But you never came!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008500_ALISAIE<tab>Du hättest gleich nach Meteion hier erscheinen sollen. Aber du bist einfach nicht gekommen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008510_ALISAIE<tab>And when you finally deign to appear, you're within an ilm of your life!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008510_ALISAIE<tab>Und als du dann endlich erschienen bist, warst du dem Tode nahe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008520_ALISAIE<tab>Damn you! Damn you for making us worry!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008520_ALISAIE<tab>Du<var 1D /var>... Du musst besser auf dich aufpassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008530_LIVINGWAY<tab>Ah, those were cries of celebration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008530_LIVINGWAY<tab>Sind die Damen und Herren vollständig versammelt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008540_LIVINGWAY<tab>Anyway, what the important thing is that you're all alive and in reasonably good health, and we mean to get you back that way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008540_LIVINGWAY<tab>Also gut. Wir schippern jetzt in aller Ruhe ans Ziel. Bitte genießt den Rest der Reise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008550_LIVINGWAY<tab>As for your earlier request, I'm quite certain we're in range to make contact now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008550_LIVINGWAY<tab>Und wegen dieser einen Sache<var 1D /var>... Wir sind bald wieder im Sendebereich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008560_THANCRED<tab>Ah, excellent. Let us announce our return at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008560_THANCRED<tab>Wir wollen die gute Nachricht so schnell wie möglich in alle Länder bringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008570_THANCRED<tab>I hope you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008570_THANCRED<tab>Bist du bereit für eine triumphale Rückkehr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>He he

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008590_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you were unconscious, we set out from Ultima Thule, you see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Während du bewusstlos warst, hat die <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarök<var 1A 01 /var> Ultima Thule bereits verlassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you stand? If so, you may wish to see what's outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kannst du aufstehen? Dann sieh doch mal raus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008610_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're home, my friend. We're home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sind wieder zu Hause.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008620_ERENVILLE<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008620_ERENVILLE<tab>Das ist doch<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008630_ERENVILLE<tab>It is! It's the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>! They're back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008630_ERENVILLE<tab>Die Ragnarök! Sie sind wieder da!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008640_WILFSUNN<tab>Thank heavens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008640_WILFSUNN<tab>Den Himmeln sei Dank!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008650_BLOEWYDA<tab>Truly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008650_BLOEWYDA<tab>Du sagst es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008660_SICARD<tab>Yes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008660_SICARD<tab>Hurra!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008670_EMMANELLAIN<tab>They've done it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008670_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Hurra!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008680_SOROBAN<tab>Welcome home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008680_SOROBAN<tab>Will...kommen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008690_HOARYBOULDER<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008690_HOARYBOULDER<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008700_CID<tab>Yes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008700_CID<tab>Jjja!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008710_FOURCHENAULT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008710_FOURCHENAULT<tab><schluck>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008720_KRILE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008720_KRILE<tab><seufz>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008730_TATARU<tab>Welcome home, everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008730_TATARU<tab>Willkommen zurück<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008740_TATARU<tab>Welcome home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008740_TATARU<tab>Willkommen zurück!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dearest Mother, Dearest Father...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Geliebter Vater, geliebte Mutter<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008760_ALPHINAUD<tab>This letter will be the very last that I write to you from the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich hoffe, ihr seid wohlauf, wenn ihr diese Zeilen lest. Dies wird wohl der letzte Brief sein, den ich euch aus dem Sonnenstein schreibe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008770_ALPHINAUD<tab>As I commit these words to parchment, I fondly recall my journey as a Scion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Während meine Feder über das Papier gleitet, kreisen meine Gedanken um den Bund der Morgenröte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008780_ALPHINAUD<tab>From the time I first walked into the order's former halls...to the time I set forth to forestall the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich erinnere mich an den ersten Tag. Wie ich Eorzea verändern wollte. Nun haben wir den ganzen Planeten gerettet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008790_ALPHINAUD<tab>At the farthest reaches of the sea of stars, we fought the battle of our lives...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bis an den Rand des Universums trug uns unser Kampf für das Gute<var 1D /var>... Was für eine Erfahrung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fought against despair itself─a veritable maelstrom of it fed by the resignation that dwelled in the hearts of beings not so unlike ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich sollte unseren Sieg feiern, schätze ich. Doch die Hoffnungs<var 16 /var>losig<var 16 /var>keit, die ich dort sah<var 1D /var>... habe ich schon in so vielen anderen Herzen gespürt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Full oft have I harbored the same malaise. Have I been brought to my knees, crushed by the weight of sorrow and defeat, convinced that I will never rise again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Natürlich bin ich davon nicht ausgenommen. Keineswegs. Auch mein Herz wurde ein ums andere Mal von ihr heimgesucht, das ist mir nun schmerzlicher bewusst denn je.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008820_ALPHINAUD<tab>However...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008830_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have also known many moments of unbridled joy and happiness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wenn ich mich umblickte, waren meine Freunde bei mir. Ich war nie allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008840_ALPHINAUD<tab>By this truth do I find hope within, blooming resplendent like the Elpis flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es war diese Gewissheit, die mich stets neuen Mut fassen ließ. Wieder und wieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008850_ALPHINAUD<tab>And thus do I endure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Und deswegen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do I look forward to creating more memories with my friends and loved ones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008860_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Ist es nun an der Zeit, loszuziehen. Ich möchte neue Begegnungen machen. Neue Bande knüpfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008865_ALPHINAUD<tab>For from these fertile seeds, yet more hope shall spring forth...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008865_ALPHINAUD<tab>Neue Blumen sollen auf den Feldern der Freund<var 16 /var>schaft erblühen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008870_ALPHINAUD<tab>And they will grow to become shining lights that illuminate the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008870_ALPHINAUD<tab>... und neue Feuer der Hoffnung die Finsternis der Nacht durchbrechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thus believing, I leave the Rising Stones behind, as will my comrades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Deswegen werde ich dem Sonnenstein schon bald den Rücken kehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008890_ALPHINAUD<tab>For as we have decided after careful deliberation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich habe es bereits mit den anderen besprochen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008900_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are disbanding the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich löse den Bund der Morgenröte auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008910_TATARU<tab>There you are, Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008910_TATARU<tab>Alphinaud! Hier steckst du also!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008920_TATARU<tab>Everyone is already gathered in the foyer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008920_TATARU<tab>Es haben sich bereits alle versammelt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008930_ALPHINAUD<tab>My apologies. I'll be right there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich komme sofort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008940_ALPHINAUD<tab>At least...that is what the story will be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008940_ALPHINAUD<tab>So weit die offizielle Geschichte<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sorry to keep you all waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Entschuldigt, meine Freunde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008960_ALISAIE<tab>What could you possibly have left to do now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008960_ALISAIE<tab>Wo warst du denn?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh, just a letter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich hatte noch einen Brief zu schreiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008980_THANCRED<tab>I imagine it will be a while before we can gather like this again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008980_THANCRED<tab>Es wird wahrscheinlich eine Weile dauern, bis wir uns alle wiedersehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008990_YSHTOLA<tab>So it must be if we're to keep up appearances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008990_YSHTOLA<tab>Der Bund verhindert das Ende der Welt - und endet selbst. Nun werden die Allianzen, Ge<var 16 /var>sell<var 16 /var>schaften und Stadt<var 16 /var>staaten ihre Probleme selber lösen müssen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009000_YSHTOLA<tab>From now on, it falls to the Grand Company of Eorzea and its allies to deal with the realm's crises.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009000_YSHTOLA<tab>Unsere regelmäßigen Sitzungen sind damit wohl ein Ding der Ver<var 16 /var>gangen<var 16 /var>heit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009010_URIANGER<tab>Meanwhile, we shall return to our erstwhile ways.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009010_URIANGER<tab>Sieh es als eine Rückkehr zu unseren Anfängen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009020_URIANGER<tab>Retreating from plain sight to take our place in the shadows once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009020_URIANGER<tab>Wir werden im Verborgenen agieren, ganz wie der Geheimbund, auf den Minfilia uns einschwor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. For the foreseeable future, I expect that we must work independently as we seek out problems that want for solving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Damals sind wir durch die Welt gereist und haben uns unsere Aufgaben selbst gesucht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009040_ALPHINAUD<tab>But a day will come when we face another great challenge. And we will face it together, as we always have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir werden schon ein paar Bestien oder Dämonen finden, um uns zu beschäftigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009050_KRILE<tab>As much as I look forward to that day, I do hope it doesn't come any time soon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009050_KRILE<tab>Hoffen wir, dass es nicht zu dicke kommt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009060_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, formal association or no, if any of you should require my services, you need but ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009060_ESTINIEN<tab>Und wenn ihr Hilfe braucht, ruft mich einfach. Aber bitte nachdem ihr alles besprochen habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009070_ESTINIEN<tab>I'll be glad to keep my lance arm honed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009070_ESTINIEN<tab>Ich will ja nicht, dass meine Lanze rostig wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009080_THANCRED<tab>I'll hold you to that, so you had better keep your linkpearl on hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009080_THANCRED<tab>Keine Sorge, wir melden uns. Du hast ja jetzt eine hochoffizielle Kontaktperle vom Bund der Morgenröte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009090_ALISAIE<tab>So, you really mean to stay, Tataru?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009090_ALISAIE<tab>Bleibst du hier, Tataru?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009100_TATARU<tab>Someone has to keep the Rising Stones in proper order, and even a super-secret organization requires a super-secret base of operations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009100_TATARU<tab>Natürlich! Ein Geheimbund braucht doch auch einen geheimen Stützpunkt! Außerdem muss sich ja irgendwer um das Gebäude kümmern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009110_TATARU<tab>To the rest of the world, it will be naught more than a workshop for Eorzea's foremost up-and-coming artisan!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009110_TATARU<tab>Ich werde den Sonnenstein zu meiner persönlichen Werkstatt machen und mich ganz dem Handwerk widmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009120_TATARU<tab>If you thought our coffers were full to bursting before, just wait till I can devote myself wholly to the crafts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009120_TATARU<tab>Ich hab vor, die Kassen so richtig klingeln zu lassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009130_ALISAIE<tab>Plotting to build a mercantile empire to rival that of Lord Lolorito, are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009130_ALISAIE<tab>Dann brauchen wir uns ja um die Spesenrechnungen keine Sorgen mehr zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009135_GRAHATIA<tab>[LAUGHS] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009135_GRAHATIA<tab>Haha

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009140_GRAHATIA<tab>I, for one, look forward to your future successes, Tataru, as do I our next meeting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009140_GRAHATIA<tab>Ich freue mich jetzt schon darauf, euch alle wiederzusehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009150_TATARU<tab>And with that, I believe it is past time you all made ready to depart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009150_TATARU<tab>Also dann, alle bereitmachen zur Abreise!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009160_TATARU<tab>Leave no preparations undone or words unsaid, all right? Now, off with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009160_TATARU<tab>Aber vergesst nicht, euch gebührend zu verabschieden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009170_ALISAIE<tab>I suppose we're off to Garlemald, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009170_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud und ich werden zuerst einen Abstecher nach Ishgard machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009180_ALISAIE<tab>Though we ought to speak with Lord Aymeric first. If he's received word of any recent developments, we need to know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009180_ALISAIE<tab>Großmeister Aymeric hat Nachrichten von dem Ilsabard-Korps in Garlemald erhalten und möchte sie mit uns teilen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009190_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould be prudent to purchase some warmer clothes at least. Mayhap we can pick up a few souvenirs for Jullus and the others while we're at it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sollten uns dort mit ein paar Sachen gegen die Kälte ausstatten. Vielleicht finden wir auch passende Souvenirs für Jullus und die anderen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009200_ALISAIE<tab>Where will you all be heading next?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009200_ALISAIE<tab>Und was habt ihr vor?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009210_YSHTOLA<tab>Dravania. There is a book I have been meaning to borrow from the Great Gubal Library.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009210_YSHTOLA<tab>Ich gehe ins Dravanische Hinterland. Es gibt da ein Buch in der Großen Gubal-Bibliothek, in das ich unbedingt einen Blick werfen möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009220_YSHTOLA<tab>And I can think of at least one person who will be most displeased should I fail to visit before leaving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009220_YSHTOLA<tab>Bei der Gelegenheit werde ich auch nach einer gewissen Hexe und ihren Besen sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009230_THANCRED<tab>We've no particular destination in mind, but we do intend to stop in Sharlayan before we set off.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009230_THANCRED<tab>Wir lassen uns einfach treiben. Ich glaube, Alt-Sharlayan wäre ein guter Ort, um eine neue Reise zu beginnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009240_URIANGER<tab>We had thought to ask after the Loporrits. I am curious as to how well those who chose to remain are adapting to their changed circumstances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009240_URIANGER<tab>Ja. Ich bin gespannt, wie es den Loporrit geht. Ob sie immer noch da sind?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009250_KRILE<tab>Might we accompany you, then? Raha and I were planning to return to the Baldesion Annex.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009250_KRILE<tab>Können wir euch ein Stück des Weges begleiten? Wir wollen zurück zu Baldesions Annex.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009260_GRAHATIA<tab>Commissions have been piling up in our absence, and they must be dealt with ere we begin our work in earnest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009260_GRAHATIA<tab>Es sollen sich eine Menge Anfragen angesammelt haben. Die werden wir uns ansehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien. You will return to Radz-at-Han, will you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Und du gehst nach Radz-at-Han?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009280_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye. For Vrtra's benefit, though I've yet to hear the details. I may not stay long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009280_ESTINIEN<tab>Ja. Vrtra möchte etwas von mir, das werde ich mir anhören. Aber es sollte nur ein kurzer Abstecher sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009290_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. Then it is here the Scions at last part ways, each to some far-flung corner of the realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Verstehe. Dann haben wir ja alle etwas zu tun. Zeit, Lebwohl zu sagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009300_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps. But I believe one of our number─a rather important one, at that─has yet to divulge <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> plans.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009300_YSHTOLA<tab>Von <var 08 E905 ((einer)) ((einem)) /var> haben wir noch gar nichts gehört.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009310_ESTINIEN<tab>Quite right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009310_ESTINIEN<tab>Was ist mit dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009320_URIANGER<tab>Indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009320_URIANGER<tab>Sag schon!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009330_GRAHATIA<tab>Fair point!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009330_GRAHATIA<tab>Was hast du vor?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009340_ALPHINAUD<tab>So. What's next for our humble adventurer?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was ist mit dir? Wohin gehst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)The constancy of this place never ceases to amaze me. An ocean of souls, shimmering and eternal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Die Beständigkeit dieses Ortes erstaunt mich immer wieder aufs Neue. Es ist, als würde die Zeit stillstehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009360_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)And yet...something stirs...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009360_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Und doch spüre ich etwas<var 1D /var>... Etwas rührt sich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009370_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Yes... Steeped in darkness deep as starless night, the beast hungers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009370_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Dort, unter den tiefsten Schichten der Erde, im Dunkel, wo kein Stern je leuchtet. Wo die Schatten wohnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009380_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Alas, I dare not investigate in earnest before the coming of my guiding star, as he foretold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009380_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Was auch immer es ist, es sollte so schnell wie möglich aufgehalten werden. Aber zuerst muss ich dem Stern begegnen, dessen Kommen er prophezeite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009390_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Alas, I dare not investigate in earnest before the coming of my guiding star, as she foretold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009390_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Was auch immer es ist, es sollte so schnell wie möglich aufgehalten werden. Aber zuerst muss ich dem Stern begegnen, dessen Kommen sie prophezeite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009400_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)We shall descend to the depths, you and I, to confront the dread beast Pandæmonium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009400_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Das Pandæmonium<var 1D /var>... Du und ich, wir werden zusammen hinabsteigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009410_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Oh, the sights we shall see. The sights we shall see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009410_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Ich kann es nicht erwarten<var 1D /var>...
